news.title: Trump calls Tesla boycott 'illegal' and says he's buying one to support Elon Musk
news.summary: Trump calls Musk, the controversial leader of Tesla and a new government efficiency initiative, a "truly great American" Trump: Musk is a "great American"

news.title: Southwest Airlines will charge to check bags for the first time, launch basic economy tickets
news.summary: Southwest is getting rid of its policy for free checked bags. It's ending a more than 50-year perk. The airline says the move is in the best interests of passengers.

news.title: Kohl's shares plunge 15% as retailer gives rough outlook for the year ahead
news.summary: Kohl's posted a beat on revenue for the fourth quarter on Tuesday, but issued disappointing guidance for the year ahead. Kohl's: We expect to make a profit in the first quarter of 2015.

news.title: Trump is targeting China-made containerships in new flank of global economic war on the oceans
news.summary: China dominates shipbuilding for the ocean freight market. President Trump has plans to exact economic punishment to bring the business back to the U.S.

news.title: Dick's Sporting Goods is latest retailer to forecast rocky 2025 as recession fears swirl
news.summary: Dick's Sporting Goods issued weak guidance for 2025 as consumers contend with tariffs, persistent inflation and fears around a potential recession. Dick's Sporting goods issued weak Guidance for 2025.

news.title: Why should I tip servers who earn $20 an hour?
news.summary: “It seems the whole point of tipping was to make up for low wages, and that is no longer an issue,” she says.

news.title: Small businesses reacted with jubilation to Trump’s victory. Now they’re very uncertain on the economy.
news.summary: Small-business owners are facing historic levels of uncertainty about the future. The group emphatically cheered the election of President Donald Trump and a Republican Congress.

news.title: Bearish market alarms are flashing. Citi’s latest downgrade may add fuel to the fire
news.summary: Like other Wall Street banks, Citigroup is worried about the state of the U.S. economy. For now, they recommend putting money elsewhere.

news.title: Kohl’s stock tumbles on weak outlook as sales slide. Its CEO says the company is taking action.
news.summary: Kohl’s CEO Ashley Buchanan says that the company has “identified key areas of focus.” Buchanan says the company is looking for ways to improve its financial performance.

news.title: Tariffs could cost Americans an extra $1,600 a year. Here’s where to find that money in your household budget.
news.summary: 10 practical tips, tricks and hacks for fortifying your finances against a trade war. 10 practical Tips, tricks, and hacks to fortify your money against atrade war.
